channel.title: Books on Jonathan Davila
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Jonathan Davila

item.title: Reading List: for Those Currently Managing or Those Who Are About To
item.description: This year I’ve read many books on management, some that are tech-specific and others that are more broadly focused. I present to you a short list (in no particular order) on the books I feel are the best with a brief into allowing to get a feel for whether or not the particular book is for you. Note: The links to the books are not affiliate links at all, this is purely for the public’s benefit.
